verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; A Psalm of David, a Song. Let God <S%H430><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%>, let his enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered <S%H6327><s%>; Let them also that hate <S%H8130><s%> him flee <S%H5127><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%>.

As smoke <S%H6227><s%> is driven away <S%H5086><s%>, so drive them away <S%H5086><s%>: As wax <S%H1749><s%> melteth <S%H4549><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, So let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.
But let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be glad <S%H8055><s%>; let them exult <S%H5970><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>: Yea <S%H5970><s%>, let them rejoice with gladness <S%H8057><s%>.

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to his name <S%H8034><s%>: Cast up a highway <S%H5549><s%> for him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> through the deserts <S%H6160><s%>; His name <S%H8034><s%> is Jehovah <S%H3050><s%>; and exult <S%H5937><s%> ye before him <S%H6440><s%>.
A father <S%H1><s%> of the fatherless <S%H3490><s%>, and a judge <S%H1781><s%> of the widows <S%H490><s%>, Is God <S%H430><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>.

God <S%H430><s%> setteth <S%H3427><s%> the solitary <S%H3173><s%> in families <S%H1004><s%>: He bringeth out <S%H3318><s%> the prisoners <S%H615><s%> into prosperity <S%H3574><s%>; But the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in a parched land <S%H6707><s%>.
O God <S%H430><s%>, when thou wentest forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%>, When thou didst march <S%H6805><s%> through the wilderness <S%H3452><s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

The earth <S%H776><s%> trembled <S%H7493><s%>, The heavens <S%H8064><s%> also dropped <S%H5197><s%> rain at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>: Yon <S%H2088><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> trembled at the presence <S%H6440><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
Thou <S%H430><s%>, O God, didst send <S%H5130><s%> a plentiful <S%H5071><s%> rain <S%H1653><s%>, Thou didst confirm <S%H3559><s%> thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, when it was weary <S%H3811><s%>.
Thy congregation <S%H2416><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein <S%H430><s%>: Thou, O God, didst prepare <S%H3559><s%> of thy goodness <S%H2896><s%> for the poor <S%H6041><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> the word <S%H562><s%>: The women that publish <S%H1319><s%> the tidings are a great <S%H7227><s%> host <S%H6635><s%>.
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> flee <S%H5074><s%>, they flee <S%H5074><s%>; And she that tarrieth <S%H5116><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> divideth <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%>.

When ye lie <S%H7901><s%> among the sheepfolds <S%H8240><s%>, It is as the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a dove <S%H3123><s%> covered <S%H2645><s%> with silver <S%H3701><s%>, And her pinions <S%H3671><s%> with yellow <S%H3422><s%> gold <S%H2742><s%>.
When the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> scattered <S%H6566><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> therein <S%H7949><s%>, It was as when it snoweth in Zalmon <S%H6756><s%>.
A mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>; A high <S%H1386><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> is the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>.

Why look <S%H7520><s%> ye askance <S%H1386><s%>, ye high mountains <S%H2022><s%>, At the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> hath desired <S%H2530><s%> for his abode <S%H3427><s%>? Yea <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it for ever <S%H5331><s%>.

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are twenty thousand <S%H7239><s%>, even thousands <S%H505><s%> upon thousands <S%H8136><s%>; The Lord <S%H136><s%> is among them <S%H5514><s%>, as in Sinai, in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

Thou hast ascended <S%H5927><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>, thou hast led away <S%H7628><s%> captives <S%H7628><s%>; Thou hast received <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> among men <S%H120><s%>, Yea <S%H5637><s%>, among the rebellious also <S%H3050><s%>, that Jehovah God <S%H430><s%> might dwell with them <S%H7931><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H136><s%>, who daily <S%H3117><s%> beareth <S%H6006><s%> our burden <S%H410><s%>, Even the God who is our salvation <S%H3444><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
God <S%H410><s%> is unto us a God <S%H410><s%> of deliverances <S%H4190><s%>; And unto Jehovah <S%H136><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> belongeth escape <S%H8444><s%> from death <S%H4194><s%>.

But God <S%H430><s%> will smite <S%H4272><s%> through the head <S%H7218><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%>, The hairy <S%H8181><s%> scalp <S%H6936><s%> of such a one as goeth on still <S%H1980><s%> in his guiltiness <S%H817><s%>.
The Lord <S%H136><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> from Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>;

That thou mayest crush them <S%H4272><s%>, dipping thy foot <S%H7272><s%> in blood <S%H1818><s%>, That the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of thy dogs <S%H3611><s%> may have its portion from thine enemies <S%H341><s%>.
They have seen <S%H7200><s%> thy goings <S%H1979><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, Even the goings <S%H1979><s%> of my God <S%H410><s%>, my King <S%H4428><s%>, into the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.

The singers <S%H7891><s%> went before <S%H6923><s%>, the minstrels <S%H5059><s%> followed after <S%H310><s%>, In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the damsels <S%H5959><s%> playing with timbrels <S%H8608><s%>.
Bless <S%H1288><s%> ye God <S%H430><s%> in the congregations <S%H4721><s%>, Even the Lord <S%H136><s%>, ye that are of the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

There is little <S%H6810><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> their ruler <S%H7287><s%>, The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and their council <S%H7277><s%>, The princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>.
Thy God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> thy strength <S%H5797><s%>: Strengthen <S%H5810><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, that which <S%H2098><s%> thou hast wrought for us <S%H6466><s%>.
Because of thy temple <S%H1964><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> Kings <S%H4428><s%> shall bring <S%H2986><s%> presents unto thee <S%H7862><s%>.

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> the wild beast <S%H2416><s%> of the reeds <S%H7070><s%>, The multitude <S%H2416><s%> of the bulls <S%H47><s%>, with the calves <S%H5695><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%>, Trampling under foot <S%H7511><s%> the pieces <S%H7518><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>: He hath scattered <S%H967><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> that delight <S%H2654><s%> in war <S%H7128><s%>.
Princes <S%H2831><s%> shall come out <S%H857><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> shall haste to stretch out <S%H7323><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, ye kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; Oh sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto the Lord <S%H136><s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

To him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> upon the heaven <S%H8064><s%> of heavens <S%H8064><s%>, which are of old <S%H6924><s%>; Lo <S%H5414><s%>, he uttereth his voice <S%H6963><s%>, a mighty <S%H5797><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>.
Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> ye strength <S%H5797><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>: His excellency <S%H1346><s%> is over Israel <S%H3478><s%>, And his strength <S%H5797><s%> is in the skies <S%H7834><s%>.

O God <S%H430><s%>, thou art terrible <S%H3372><s%> out of thy holy places <S%H4720><s%>: The God <S%H410><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, he giveth <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> and power <S%H5797><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>. Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God <S%H430><s%>.
